about_the_game:
Journey to distant worlds, where every puzzle is a gateway to the unknown.  Lose yourself in the meditative rhythm of matching tiles, unlocking new experiences as you explore the realms.

Unlock Mystical and Alien Realms

Progress through beautifully crafted realms, each with its own unusual tile sets and atmospheric themes. From tranquil zen spaces to eerie alien worlds, every realm offers a distinct experience.

Puzzle Editor & Steam Workshop Integration

Craft your own puzzles with the intuitive editor and share them on the Steam Workshop. Browse a growing collection of player-made layouts for endless replayability and challenges.

Immersive Music & Visuals

Each realm is brought to life with custom music tracks and striking visuals, creating a deep, immersive atmosphere that evolves with your journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a world of mystical, alien realms in this unique take on mahjong solitaire. Unlock new themes as you advance and design your own layouts to share with the community.
